attributes.action: Give us parents and teachers back the right to punish our kids when needed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment and "do gooders" have taken away the right to punish our kids. Parents and teachers have NO respect from kids of today, when i was a lad in the 1980s i would have NEVER have dis-respected my parents and teachers,swearing was never in front of our parents or teachers, kids now do this  freely because they know they wont get punished. Can the goverment not see the downward spiral in the behavior it is creating !gun crime, murder and violnce is an every day event now, where will it end ??. Respect of fellow humanbeings starts when you are young,so lets do something about it... GIVE US BACK THE RIGHT TO PUNISH OUR KIDS !
